name: Drusilla Dreams
description: The lovely Drusilla has overthrown her brother Caligula, and has become the Empress of the Roman Empire! Drusilla Dreams is a short yuri style visual novel about the loving relationship between Drusilla, and her favorite slave Lucca.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium IV 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Do you have a fetish for: - incest - master/slave romance - default Ren'Py UI - 'tell, don't show' storytelling - poor grammar and spelling - basic scripting errors - content updates in which the developer insults reviewers instead of actually fixing the problems with the game?  If so,  what the ♥♥♥♥ is wrong with you  you might enjoy this! Otherwise avoid. It's not even bad in a funny way, just incompetent and irritating. I only bothered to read the whole thing because it's just 25 minutes long. The only positive is the character art; I hope I can see some more of the artist's work in a better visual novel.  EDIT: And now the developer has banned me from the Drusilla Dreams community. Wonder how many other negative reviewers got the same treatment.
best game i have ever played 9/11 but to be honest: not my proudest fap..

Drusilla Dreams is a short VN that takes place after the events in 'I Am Caligula' with a few different endings. There's some pretty nice art, and a few Yuri themed scenes, which is always good in my eyes. A nice story, with nice art. Nice job! Definitely worth the money! I mean, for 99 cents, you can't go wrong, there's not much to lose! Go ahead and give it a try!
